records.context_note: An alleged unofficial refoulement occurred on May 24th along the Evros River near Didymoteicho, Greece. A family of six (including an infant) and three men, seeking asylum, were reportedly handed over by Greek police to masked gunmen and sent back to Turkey. Among them was journalist Murat Çapan, who was subsequently imprisoned in Turkey. The Hellenic League for Human Rights (HLHR) has contacted UNHCR and plans to bring the matter to Greek courts.
records.evidence_quote: An unofficial refoulement from Greece to Turkey took place along the Evros River on May 24th. This time, it concerns Turkish citizens seeking asylum in Greece, among them Murat Çapan...
